sentence.Network_en: Expressing illiberal views may bring some politicians into temporary prominence.
sentence.Network_cn: 发表偏狭之见也许能使某些政治家名噪一时.

sentence.Network_en: Their tendency is gross and illiberal.
sentence.Network_cn: 说这种话显得粗野,缺乏教养.

illegitimation 认为不法illiberal 狭碍的illiberalism 反自由主义
illocal 不只一处的，无所不在的illiberal 吝啬的，粗鄙的il- == (用在l之前)加强或引伸意义

list.abs: "非自由民主政体"(illiberal democracies)是现代历史的一个现象，这种政体之所以能获得合法性从而有势力，是因为这些政权似乎还算 …
...新兴民主国家中，有64个是自由民主国家，24个是不自由的民主国家（illiberal democracies），亦即还没有建立起法治、宪政的国家。
He is an illiberal populist , sneering at gays and hinting at bringing back the penalty ., 他是一个狭隘的平民主义者 , 嘲讽同性恋者以及暗示恢复死刑.
his illiberally biased way of thinking ., 他的狭隘而又偏激的思维方式.

...》国际版主编法里德·扎卡里亚（Fareed Zakaria）2003年的著作《自由的未来：美国内外的不自由民主》（The Future of Freedom: Illiberal Democracy at Home and Abroad）提出，在国民生产总值没有达到一定水平的国家和地区，民主是无法生存的，即使强行在这些地方推行，也只会换来适得其反的结果，培育出一种他称之为“不自由民主”（illiberal Democracy）的邪恶事物来――即那种以大众之名行独裁之实的民主――其危害性更有甚于从前；

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'vulgar, ill-bred'): from French illibéral, from Latin illiberalis 'mean, sordid', from in- 'not' + liberalis (see liberal)

entry.tran: 狭隘的;偏执的;严格僵化的;不自由的
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as illiberal, you are critical of them because they do not allow or approve of much freedom or choice of action.

auth_sentence.content: Theresa May's Bill is illiberal and pointless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Theresa May's Bill is illiberal and pointless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Theresa May's Bill is illiberal and pointless.

auth_sentence.content: Turkey is still illiberal in important ways.
auth_sentence.res_content: Turkey is still illiberal in important ways.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Turkey is still illiberal in important ways.

auth_sentence.content: I make the case that authoritarianism is illiberal and progress-killing, and I show the limitations of the Chinese approach.
auth_sentence.res_content: I make the case that authoritarianism is illiberal and progress-killing, and I show the limitations of the Chinese approach.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I make the case that authoritarianism is illiberal and progress-killing, and I show the limitations of the Chinese approach.

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不+liberal宽大的→不宽大的→吝啬的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 慷慨的,大方的;富足的;自由的,思想开放的
stems_affixes.word_buile: liber自由+al……的→adj.慷慨的,大方的;富足的;自由的,思想开放的
liber自由+t+ine人→自由之人→浪荡子
liber自由+ty表名词→n.自由,自由权;特权

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不,无+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
il不,无+liberal宽大的→adj.气量狭窄的,吝啬的
il不,无+licit合法的, 正当的→adj.违法的,违禁的
il不,无+literate有文化的→adj.不识字的
il不,无+logical逻辑的→adj.不合逻辑的
il使……,成为,进入,再+lus玩弄+ion表名词→被[幻觉]玩弄→幻觉
il使……,成为,进入,再+lumin光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
il使……,成为,进入,再+lustr=lust光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
